com.sleepycat.je.util
Class MemoryHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.util.logging.Handler
      java.util.logging.MemoryHandler
          com.sleepycat.je.util.MemoryHandler

public class MemoryHandler
extends MemoryHandler

JE instances of java.util.logging.Logger are configured to use this implementation of java.util.logging.MemoryHandler. By default, the handler's level is Level.INFO. To enable the memory handler, use the standard java.util.logging configuration to set the desired level: 

 com.sleepycat.je.util.MemoryHandler.level=WARNING
This handler is mainly meant for diagnostic use.
